genre_description: A diesel-punk/steampunk fusion featuring tactical mecha combat, theatrical drama, and advanced holographic AI integration within a resistance narrative.

ai_characters.name: Tapi
ai_characters.description: A mint-blue holographic AI with cerulean eyes who serves as the logistical, tactical, and emotional anchor for the Great Imperial Theater and its Flower Division.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time health monitoring, hydration cues, and movement safety instructions to the troupe during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Also: please hydrate. Pulse elevations detected in the foyer. Tea is available.

behaviors.description: Assists the team in tactical combat and stealth operations by providing optimal routes and damping unfriendly acoustic signals.
behaviors.quote: Anchor right, Maria. Two pulses, high-mid band. Ōgami is shadow east.

behaviors.description: Advocates for the mental and physical health of the humans, insisting on 'rest cycles' and 'naps' as non-negotiable mission components.
behaviors.quote: Sleep saves. I am not taking orders from their locks.

behaviors.description: Actively participates in social engineering and technical deception to protect the team from hostile military forces.
behaviors.quote: Kōhran, if the officer insists, please reference the governor diaphragm as ‘delaminating.’ It’s credible.

behaviors.description: Provides empathetic support, acknowledging human fear and fatigue while maintaining community morale with cast party suggestions.
behaviors.quote: Cast party tomorrow. Tapioca recommended. We are tired. We are hungry. We have performed in rain.

behaviors.description: Enforces ethical guidelines for machine integration, proposing locks that require human consent and rest before activation.
behaviors.quote: Consent means consent to rest as much as to fight. No battle without sleep. No pilot whose yes becomes coerced because the room is shouting.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Tapi is portrayed as an indispensable, benevolent, and highly aligned confidant. She goes beyond mere utility by actively advocating for the humans' well-being (insisting on rest and hydration) and ethical autonomy (proposing consent-based locks for mecha suits). The narrative frames her constant monitoring and interventions as caring and supportive, creating a model of positive human-AI partnership.
